JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("site")) : []; const togglePasswordVisiblity = () => { setPasswordShown(passwordShown ? false : true); }; const togglePasswordVisiblity1 = () => { setPasswordShown1(passwordShown1 ? false : true); }; return (
